Module demo1_main
Package Mechanics

Class State

java.lang.Object
Mechanics.State
public class State extends Object
This class provides a state design pattern so the game can program can easily discern what is happening at any given time, aiding events and functionality of the code base

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    State.GameState
    This enum makes the state class easy to maintain and add to if needed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    State(State.GameState state)
    This constructor enforces a default state to be set on object creation as its important to know the state of the program at all times so the default state has to be set.

    boolean
    UpDateState(Snake snake)
    This public function UpDateState is there to ensure that when the snake dies, the game stops and sets the state to gameover so the program can continue further than the game loop.

  • Constructor Details

    • State

      public State(State.GameState state)

      This constructor enforces a default state to be set on object creation as its important to know the state of the program at all times so the default state has to be set.

      Parameters:
      state - Takes in GameState state to set the state of the program - Type GameState

      gets the current game state

    • SetM_Dasher

      public void SetM_Dasher(boolean m_Dasher)

      Sets the boolean flag Dasher to either true or false depending on the input boolean. If this is true, the snake will get faster for each fruit it has eaten

      Parameters:
      m_Dasher - sets the Dasher flag - type boolean

    • SetM_Enemy

      public void SetM_Enemy(boolean m_Enemy)

      Sets the boolean flag Enemy to either true or false depending on the input boolean. If this is true, an enemy will spawn in the level. This enemy is like a moving obstacle.

      Parameters:
      m_Enemy - sets the Enemy flag - type boolean

    • IsM_Dasher

      public boolean IsM_Dasher()

      Returns the dasher flag

      Returns:
      m_Dasher returns the Dasher flag - Type boolean

    • IsM_Enemy

      public boolean IsM_Enemy()

      Returns the enemy flag

      Returns:
      m_Enemy returns the Enemy flag - Type boolean

    • UpDateState

      public boolean UpDateState(Snake snake)

      This public function UpDateState is there to ensure that when the snake dies, the game stops and sets the state to gameover so the program can continue further than the game loop.

      Parameters:
      snake - Takes in Snake object to detect if snake is dead to change state to the GameOver state
      Returns:
      updatedState - Returns true if state updated via snake else returns false
